input.sentences: at a recent ceremony honoring commanders who had served in location | politicians were introduced to the recipients through a receiving line .
and family members of those who had served under them .
a speech was given and awards were passed out .

output.sentences: The recipients of the service award was granted to recent military men who served their country.
The press came to interview several of them.
The military men claimed that they felt proud of having served their family.
After the speech passed, the military men were given their awards.
In the end, the recipients posed together for the event picture.
